report.title: Load, Light, Toke.
report.author: Holydiver
report.bodytext: There I was /n /n White powder /n /n Lights off /n /n Bed made /n /n I lit the lighter /n /n The powder quickly became oil /n /n The oil seeped into the wool /n /n 1 /n 2 /n 3 /n can I do it??? /n /n Yes I can I take the 4th cottony hit /n /n 4 Large hits through a bong /n /n I hit the pillow /n /n Impossible visions /n /n I remember /n /n Entities say hi /n /n They say goodbye /n /n I am waking up /n /n Reality is becoming clear again /n /n DMT hyperspace is folding back into the 3d world I'm used to. /n /n I'm being reborn. /n /n Now I remember who I am. /n /n /n But I forget how it feels to breakthrough /n /n I forget about the impossabilitys. /n /n And on my life goes /n /n Load, Light, Toke, Remember, Forget.
